medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain for 9 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Initially periumbilical abdominal pain that migrated to the right lower quadrant over a few hours. Reports intermittent nausea throughout, now with emesis for 24 hours leading to presentation. Denies fevers/chills, no change in bowel habits.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic constipation, Folate deficiency anemia, Hemochromatosis, pernicious anemia.
medical_history.family_history: Denies IBD/CRC. Mother: healthy, Father: healthy.
